category: news
title: "These AI-controlled traffic lights could help save lives"
excerpt: "The German town of Bad Hersfeld is seeking to let artificial intelligence take control of its traffic light network in emergency situations. The idea is to enable the relevant services to get around as quickly as possible and to get to the scene of an accident within 10 minutes."
